name: Transportistas de Argentina

api_list.name: /cities/states
api_list.description: List of states for Argentina with iso code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transportistas-de-argentina.p.rapidapi.com/cities/states"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transportistas-de-argentina.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /tracking/correo_argentino/create_task/:service/:tracking_code
api_list.description:
Create task to get the history.
The result of the trace can be obtained after approximately 20-60 seconds by calling the endpoint: /tracking/correo_argentino/result_task/:task_id
**IMPORTANT: ** The result will only be stored for approx 1 hour.

api_list.name: /bins/calculate
api_list.description: Calculate box from one list of products and boxes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transportistas-de-argentina.p.rapidapi.com/bins/calculate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transportistas-de-argentina.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
